title: Save The Last Dance For Me
lyrics:
[intro] (A)
You can (A)dance… every dance with the guy
Who gave you the eye, let him (E7)hold you tight
You can (E7)smile… every smile for the man
Who held your hand 'neath the (A)pale moonlight
 
[chorus]
But (A7)don't for-(D)get who's taking you home
And in whose arms you're (A)gonna be
So (E7)darlin', save the last dance for (A)me
 
Oh I (A)know (Oh I know) that the music's fine
Like sparkling wine, go and (E7)have your fun (Yes I know, Oh I know)
Laugh and (E7)sing, but while we're apart, don't give your heart to (A)anyone
 
[chorus]
'Cause (A7)don't for-(D)get who's taking you home
And in whose arms you're (A)gonna be
So (E7)darlin', save the last dance for (A)me
 
[bridge]
Baby, don't you know I (E7)love you so? Can't you feel it when we (A)touch?
I will never, never (E7)let you go I love you oh so (A)much
 
You can (A)dance (You can dance), go and carry on
Till the night is gone, and it's (E7)time to go (You can dance)
If he (E7)asks… if you’re all alone
Can he take you home, you must (A)tell him 'no'
 
[chorus]
'Cause (A7)don't for-(D)get who's taking you home
And in whose arms you're (A)gonna be
So (E7)darlin', save the last dance for (A)me
But (A7)don't for-(D)get who's taking you home
And in whose arms you're (A)gonna be
So (E7)darlin’, save the last dance for (A)me
(E7)Darlin', save the last dance for (A)me
(E7)Darlin', save the last dance for (A)me (cha-cha-cha) [end]
